subject: CHAUTAUQUA-CON 2009!!!
author: Brian~Renee
full_text:
HOPE YOU ALL DONT MIND ME POSTING THIS IN HERE - LONG TIME MEMBER HERE. 
ALSO WE ARE LOOKING FOR A TECH PERSON TO SPEAK AT OUR FUNDRAISER EVENT, 
IF ANYBODY IS NEARBY AND INTERESTED, THEN EMAIL ME.

A PARA-CONVENTION/FUNDRAISER FOR ALL IN SHELBYVILLE IL COME SAT SEPT
19TH 2009 BETWEEN 10AM-8PM!!!

www.myspace.com/chautauquacon


BRIAN
